summary: Expands on the fantastic mod by Madcat221 by adding prefixes of all kinds to his brilliant Steel Plate Armour.
descriptionHtml:
Installation -

This mod requires Madcat221's Robed Steel Plate Armour & Robed Ebony Armour. Please read the installation instructions for these mods! They're not as simple to install together as you might think.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10506
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28190

Once you've installed the aforementioned mods PROPERLY, simply drag the file into your Data folder and replace your existing file and you're good to go!

What this mod does as of V4 -

Every Novice, Apprentice and Adept Robe can now be combined with a Steel Plate Armor to produce a Heavy Robe with the previous Robe's Enchantments via the Forge, once you have the relevant perk. So, if you combined an Apprentice Robe of Destruction with a Steel Plate Armour, you'd get an Apprentice Robed Steel Plate Armor of Destruction!

Adept Robes can be combined with an Ebony Armor and a Frostbite Spider Venom to produce a Heavy Robe with the previous Robe's Enchantments via the forge, once you have the relevant perk. So, if you combined an Adept Robe of Destruction with an Ebony Armor, you'd get a Robed Ebony Armor of Destruction!

All Robes can be crafted at a Smithy as soon as you've acquired the "Advanced Armours" perk. They can also be improved at a workbench.

The Robes added by this mod have been sparingly added to NPCs, where it makes sense. Faralda no longer sells the Robes added by this mod.

If you like this mod, you may also like Mage Apparel Overhaul:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34543/?
